Blog.post: i think i am officially the BIGGEST loser in the world! im sitting here, on saturday, at 8:30, in my pajamas, with nothing to do and no one to talk to. ugh, im so bored. if i dont have something to do soon im gonna scream
well, i guess that no one reads this. oh well
By the way, if anyone happens to be reading this, lemme know, comment or something. I just wanna know if anyone actually will ever look at this.

hi! i have no clue really how this works, but i figured, what the hay, i have nothing better to do with my time so... YAY! im thinking its kinda like xanga, so, ill give it a shot. hehe well, im gonna play around and write more lata! peace
yay, i just looked through my thing and i found out that someone actually saw it... YAY... go you!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! thanks for commenting. well, thats all i have to say about that.

the last few days for me have been hard. starting sunday i found out that the little boy next door to me died on friday. he was only 5 and had been struggling with leukimia for about a year now. we all thought he was getting so much better, it came as a shock to everyone. monday i got to relax, i went to the beach with matt, ev, and alexis, which was good for me, i got to forget how sad i was, and remember how happy i could be. matt was sweet, and i remembered all the reasons i love him. yesterday was perfect. tomm. i have the funeral. luckily, matts going with me, i dont think id be able to go without him. my parents are both not able to go, so i need matt to be there for support. hopefully afterwards we can go see princess diaries 2, (i love julie andrews). but i need to survive the funeral first. well, im gonna go now, peace

well, my baby came home last night, and made my day. we went to church today and everyone is leaving for camp tomm. but the incubus concert is also tomm. im really REALLY excited... mmm... brandon boyd... yummy! hehe. but ev left today after church for his 6 day trip and matt leaves wed for his trip, so im gonna be all alone here like, all this week, oh well. ill prolly be babbling on more then (yay for you... hehe)
